{{Infobox TV channel| |name= Jetix |logofile= |logosize= |logoalt= Jetix (France) |launch= November 1997 |owner= [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] |former names = Fox Kids until 2005 |web= [http://www.foxkids.fr www.foxkids.fr] |terr avail=Not Available |sat serv 1= |sat chan 1= |cable serv 1= |cable chan 1= |}} '''Jetix''' was a children's television programming brand owned by [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] and [[The Walt Disney Company]] broadcast in [[France]]. It was previously known as [[Fox Kids]].
The channel was available in [[France]], [[Monaco]], [[Belgium]], [[Luxembourg]], [[Switzerland]], [[Madagascar]], [[RÃ©union]], [[Mauritius]] and [[Caribbean Sea]] ([[Antilles]], [[Guyane]], [[Guadaloupe]], [[Martinique]]). There were two Jetix websites in France, one for Jetix and one carrying their former title, [[Fox Kids]]. www.FoxKids.Fr was mainly a Jetix Website with the Fox Kids logo slapped on it, then relabeled with [[The Walt Disney Company]] ownership.
==Disney XD rebrand== After successfully rolling out [[Disney XD]] in the [[USA]] in February 2009, [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] dÃ©buted in France on April 1, 2009 and in other European territories in 2009.<ref name="Disney XD"> {{cite web |url=http://www.broadbandtvnews.com/?p=14241 |title=French Jetix becomes Disney XD |publisher=Broadband TV News |date=2009-02-16 }}</ref><ref name="Disney XD2"> {{cite web |url=http://www.c21media.net/resources/detail.asp?area=79&article=47666 |title=Jetix France rebrands as Disney XD |publisher=[[C21 Media]] |date=2009-02-17 }}</ref>
